stats.title: AP Statistics
stats.description: Master statistical concepts, probability distributions, hypothesis testing, and data analysis techniques essential for the AP Statistics exam.

csp.title: AP Computer Science Principles
csp.description: Comprehensive reference guide covering data representation, programming fundamentals, networking protocols, and the societal impact of computing.
csp.meta: ✅ Data • Programming • Networking • Impact of Computing

apush.title: AP US History
apush.description: Journey through American history from pre-Columbian times to the present, focusing on key themes, historical patterns, and analytical thinking skills.

chem.title: AP Chemistry
chem.description: Navigate atomic structure, chemical bonding, thermodynamics, kinetics, and equilibrium with comprehensive explanations and practice examples.

calc.title: AP Calculus AB/BC
calc.description: Explore limits, derivatives, integrals, and the fundamental theorem of calculus with step-by-step explanations and problem-solving strategies.

physics.title: AP Physics C: Mechanics, E&M
physics.description: Master mechanics, electricity, and magnetism through advanced calculus-based physics concepts and comprehensive problem-solving techniques.

bio.title: AP Biology
bio.description: Explore evolution, cellular processes, genetics, and ecological systems with detailed explanations of biological principles and laboratory techniques.

psych.title: AP Psychology
psych.description: Study biological bases of behavior, sensation and perception, learning theories, cognitive psychology, and abnormal psychology concepts.

gov.title: AP United States Government & Politics
gov.description: Analyze the structure, function, and development of the U.S. governmental system, including constitutional foundations and political processes.

apes.title: AP Environmental Science
apes.description: Examine environmental systems, human impact on ecosystems, pollution control, and sustainability practices through scientific analysis.

world.title: AP World History
world.description: Survey global historical developments from ancient civilizations to modern times, emphasizing comparative analysis and cross-cultural connections.

euro.title: AP European History
euro.description: Trace European history from the Renaissance to present, focusing on political, social, economic, and cultural transformations across centuries.

geo.title: AP Human Geography
geo.description: Investigate spatial patterns of human activity, population distribution, cultural landscapes, and the relationship between people and places.

lang.title: AP English Language & Composition
lang.description: Develop advanced writing and rhetorical analysis skills through the study of persuasive writing, argument construction, and stylistic techniques.

lit.title: AP English Literature & Composition
lit.description: Analyze literary works from various periods and cultures, exploring themes, techniques, and the artistry of poetry, drama, and fiction.
